jei.tooltip.not.enough.space: The area on the right-hand side of this screen is too small for the JEI ingredient list overlay to display.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.nokey: Add a key binding for JEI bookmarks in your Controls settings.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.usage.key: Hover over an ingredient and press "%s" to bookmark it.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.not.enough.space: The area on the left-hand side of this screen is too small for the JEI bookmark list overlay to display.
jei.tooltip.bookmarks.recipe.remove: Remove the bookmark for this recipe.
jei.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.no.ser: The server must have JEI installed.
jei.tooltip.error.recipe.transfer.too.la: Recipe is too large to craft in the 2x2 player crafting grid.
jei.tooltip.error.crash: This ingredient crashed when getting its tooltip. Please see the client logs for details.
jei.tooltip.error.render.crash: This ingredient crashed when being rendered. Please see the client logs for details.
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.1: You do not have permission to use JEI's cheat mode.
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.disab: On this server, it is disabled for all players.
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.enabl: On this server, only the following types of players can use it:
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.creat: players who are in the creative mode
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.op: players who have an operator status (/op)
jei.chat.error.no.cheat.permission.give: players who can use the "/give" command
jei.key.category.hover.config.button: JEI (Hovering With Mouse Over Config Button)
jei.config.name: Name: %s
jei.config.title: %MODNAME Config
jei.config.mode.description: Change the mode that JEI is operating in.
jei.config.mode.cheatItemsEnabled.descri: Give items instead of showing the recipe.
jei.config.mode.editEnabled.description: Hide or unhide ingredients by clicking them in the ingredient list overlay.
jei.config.interface.description: Options related to the user interface.
jei.config.interface.overlayEnabled.desc: Show the ingredient list overlay next to open GUIs.
jei.config.interface.bookmarkOverlayEnab: Show the bookmark list overlay next to open GUIs.
jei.config.client.appearance.description: Config options to change the appearance of JEI.
jei.config.client.appearance.centerSearc: Move the JEI search bar to the bottom center of the screen.
jei.config.client.appearance.recipeGuiHe: The maximum height for the Recipes Gui (in pixels).
jei.config.client.cheating.giveMode.desc: Choose if JEI should give ingredients directly to the inventory or pick them up with the mouse.
jei.config.client.cheating.cheatToHotbar: Cheat Items to Hotbar Using Hotkeys
Enable cheating items into the hotbar by using Shift + numeric keys.
jei.config.client.cheating.showHiddenIng: Enable showing ingredients that are not in the creative menu.
jei.config.client.cheating.showTagRecipe: Show recipes for ingredient tags like item tags and block tags.
jei.config.client.bookmarks.description: Config options related to Bookmarking ingredients and recipes.
jei.config.client.bookmarks.addBookmarks: When true, add new bookmarks to the front of the list. When false, add them to the end.
jei.config.client.bookmarks.dragToRearra: Enable dragging bookmarks to rearrange them in the list.
jei.config.client.tooltips.description: Config options related to Tooltips in JEI.
jei.config.client.tooltips.holdShiftToSh: Hold Shift to show bookmark tooltip features.
jei.config.client.tooltips.showCreativeT: Show creative tab names in ingredient tooltips.
jei.config.client.tooltips.tagContentToo: Show tag content in tooltips when browsing recipe ingredients.
jei.config.client.tooltips.hideSingleTag: Hide tag content in tooltips when there is only one ingredient in the tag.
jei.config.client.lookups.description: Config options related to looking up uses and recipes for ingredients in JEI.
jei.config.client.lookups.lookupFluidCon: When looking up recipes with items that contain fluids, also look up recipes for the fluids.
jei.config.client.lookups.lookupBlockTag: When searching for item tags, also include tags for the default blocks contained in the items.
jei.config.client.input.description: Config options related to Inputs in JEI.
jei.config.client.input.dragDelayInMilli: Number of milliseconds before a long mouse click is considered dragging the mouse.
jei.config.client.input.smoothScrollRate: Scroll rate for scrolling the mouse wheel in smooth-scrolling scroll boxes. Measured in pixels.
jei.config.client.performance.descriptio: Config options related to performance optimizations in JEI.
jei.config.client.performance.lowMemoryS: Set search to low-memory mode (makes search slow but uses less RAM).
jei.config.client.advanced.description: Advanced config options to change the way JEI functions.
jei.config.client.advanced.catchRenderEr: Catch render errors from modded ingredients and attempt to recover from them instead of crashing.
jei.config.client.sorting.description: Config options related to how JEI sorts recipes and ingredients.
jei.config.client.sorting.ingredientSort: Sorting order for the ingredient list.
jei.config.client.search.description: Config options related to how JEI searches recipes.
jei.config.client.search.creativeTabSear: Search mode for creative mode tab names (prefix: %).
jei.config.client.search.searchAdvancedT: Search in advanced tooltips (visible with F3 + H).
jei.config.client.search.searchModIds.de: Search mod IDs in addition to mod names.
jei.config.client.search.searchModAliase: Search mod aliases (alternative names) that are added by plugins, in addition to mod names.
jei.config.client.search.searchShortModN: Search by the shorthand first letters of a mod's name.
jei.config.client.search.searchIngredien: Search ingredient aliases (alternative names) that are added by plugins, in addition to ingredient names.
jei.config.client.ingredientList.descrip: Config options related to the Ingredient List (the list of ingredients on the right side of the screen)
jei.config.client.ingredientList.horizon: Horizontal alignment of the ingredient list inside the available area.
jei.config.client.ingredientList.vertica: Vertical alignment of the ingredient list inside the available area.
jei.config.client.ingredientList.buttonN: Visibility of the top page buttons. Use AUTO_HIDE to only show it when there are multiple pages.
jei.config.client.ingredientList.drawBac: Enable this to draw a background texture behind the ingredient list.
jei.config.client.bookmarkList.descripti: Config options related to the Bookmark List (the list of bookmarked ingredients on the left side of the screen)
jei.config.client.bookmarkList.horizonta: Horizontal alignment of the bookmark list inside the available area.
jei.config.client.bookmarkList.verticalA: Vertical alignment of the bookmark list inside the available area.
jei.config.client.bookmarkList.buttonNav: Visibility of the top page buttons. Use AUTO_HIDE to only show it when there are multiple pages.
jei.config.client.bookmarkList.drawBackg: Enable this to draw a background texture behind the bookmark list.
jei.config.client.advanced.itemBlacklist: List of ingredients that should not be displayed in the ingredient list overlay. Format: modId[:name[:meta]]. The hide ingredients mode will automatically add or remove entries here.
jei.config.client.advanced.maxColumns.de: The maximum width of the ingredient and bookmark list overlays.
jei.config.modIdFormat.modName.descripti: Config options related to displaying Mod Names
jei.config.modIdFormat.modName.modNameFo: Formatting for the mod names in tooltips for JEI GUIs. Leave blank to disable.
jei.config.debug.debug.description: Config options to help developers debug issues in JEI
jei.config.debug.debug.debugInfoTooltips: Add debug information to ingredient tooltips when advanced tooltips are enabled.
jei.config.debug.debug.crashingTestItems: Adds ingredients to JEI that intentionally crash, to help debug JEI.
jei.config.debug.debug.logSuffixTreeStat: Log information about the suffix trees used for searching, to help debug JEI.
jei.config.colors.colors.description: Config options related to searching for colors of items in JEI
gui.jei.category.recipe.crashed: This recipe crashed. Please see the client logs for details.
jei.message.configured: Install the "Configured" mod to access the in-game config
jei.message.config.folder: Or click here to open the JEI config folder instead
jei.message.copy.recipe.id.success: The following recipe ID was copied to the clipboard: %s
jei.message.copy.recipe.id.failure: Failed to copy the recipe ID to the clipboard because the ID is unknown
_comment: Debug (for a debug mode, do not need translation)
description.jei.wooden.door.1: Wooden doors allow you to block monsters from entering your building.\nTesting sentences.
description.jei.wooden.door.2: Clicking on a door changes its state from open to closed and vice versa.
description.jei.wooden.door.3: Wooden doors can be opened/closed via redstone circuits.
